com.google.cloud

Class WaitForOption.CheckingPeriod

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.cloud.WaitForOption
      • com.google.cloud.WaitForOption.CheckingPeriod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    WaitForOption

    public static final class WaitForOption.CheckingPeriod
extends WaitForOption
    This class represents an option to set how frequently the resource status should be checked. Objects of this class keep the actual period and related time unit for the checking period.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getOrDefault

        public static WaitForOption.CheckingPeriod getOrDefault(WaitForOption... options)
        Returns the CheckingPeriod option specified in options. If no CheckingPeriod could be found among options, the default checking period (500 milliseconds) is used.
